Title: Exempts certain distributions of revenues from the twelve-county/downstate portion of the metropolitan mass transportation operating assistance account from certain reductions
Summary: Exempts certain distributions of revenues from the twelve-county/downstate portion of the metropolitan mass transportation operating assistance account from certain reductions.
LawCode: Amd ยง23, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to exempting certain distributions of revenues from the twelve-county/downstate portion of the metropolitan mass transportation operating assistance account from certain reductions
